title: Dancing in the moonlight
lyrics: tone   x2 We get it on most every night… when that moon is big and bright It’s a supernatural delight… everybody’s dancing in the moonlight   Everybody here is out of sight , they don’t bark and they don’t bite They keep things loose they keep it tight , everybody’s dancing in the moonlight Dancing in the moonlight , everybody’s feeling warm and bright It’s such a fine and natural sight , everybody’s dancing in the moonlight   We like our fun and we never fight , you can't dance and stay uptight It’s a supernatural delight , everybody’s dancing in the moonlight Dancing in the moonlight , everybody’s feeling warm and bright It’s such a fine and natural sight , everybody’s dancing in the moonlight   x2 We get it on most every night.. when that moon is big and bright It’s a supernatural delight.. everybody’s dancing in the moonlight Dancing in the moonlight , everybody’s feeling warm and bright It’s such a fine and natural sight , everybody’s dancing in the moonlight
